Klaus Mueller.description: still at the library working on his research paper (taking notes on relevant sources) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table

Sam Moore.description: running errands or catching up on emails (checking his bank account and paying bills) @ the Ville:The Willows Market and Pharmacy:store:behind the pharmacy counter

Ayesha Khan.description: researching for her senior thesis at the library (organizing her notes) @ the Ville:Oak Hill College:library:library table

Eddy Lin.description: conversing about how to better represent and involve the Black community in their project on gentrification and inequality @ <persona> Tom Moreno
chat: Eddy Lin
Hey Tom, I was just thinking about our project on gentrification and inequality. Do you have any ideas on how we can better represent and involve the Black community in our collaboration?
Tom Moreno
I think we should reach out to local Black community leaders and organizations to get their input and perspective on our project.
Eddy Lin
That's a great idea, Tom. We should definitely make sure to actively involve and collaborate with the Black community to ensure our project is respectful and impactful.
Tom Moreno
We can also consider hosting a community event specifically for the Black community to showcase our project and gather feedback.
Eddy Lin
That sounds like a fantastic idea, Tom. I will start reaching out to community leaders and organizations right away to get their valuable input.
Tom Moreno
I agree, it's important to prioritize inclusivity and diversity in our project.
Eddy Lin
Thanks for your insights, Tom. I'll make sure to reach out to the Black community leaders and organizations to involve them in our project.
Tom Moreno
We should also ensure that our project includes diverse perspectives and experiences to accurately reflect the community.
Eddy Lin
Thank you, Tom. I appreciate your input and support for prioritizing inclusivity and diversity in our project. I will make sure to keep you updated on our progress.
Tom Moreno
We should also consider incorporating feedback from other marginalized communities in our project to ensure a comprehensive and inclusive approach.
Eddy Lin
I completely agree, Tom. It's essential to have a diverse range of voices and perspectives in our project. We should also consider reaching out to other marginalized communities for their input.
Tom Moreno
We should make sure to create a safe and inclusive space for all communities to engage with our project.
Eddy Lin
I agree, creating a safe and inclusive space for all communities is crucial for the success of our project. Let's brainstorm ways to ensure that everyone feels heard and represented.
Tom Moreno
We should also consider collaborating with local Black artists to incorporate their perspectives and experiences into our project.
Eddy Lin
I think reaching out to local Black artists will bring a unique perspective to our project. Let's see how we can incorporate their voices.
Tom Moreno
We should also reach out to Black community members who may not be part of formal organizations to ensure we are capturing a diverse range of perspectives.
